languages.text: "Признаться, я боялась, что мы с вами слишком разные. Однако... Вы помогли мне понять, что с вами я могу быть откровенной".

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, я боялась, что мы с вами слишком разные. Однако... Вы помогли мне понять, что с вами я могу быть откровенной".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, я боялась, что мы с вами слишком разные. Однако... Вы помогли мне понять, что с вами я могу быть откровенной".

traits.locale_text: "I admit I was afraid we are too difficult. And yet... You helped me understand I can be candid with you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I admit I was afraid we are too difficult. And yet... You helped me understand I can be candid with you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我承认，我曾担心我们之间会有太多不一样的地方，然而……你帮助我意识到，我可以对你坦诚相待。”
languages.original_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."

traits.locale_text: “我承认，我曾担心我们之间会有太多不一样的地方，然而……你帮助我意识到，我可以对你坦诚相待。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Admito que me preocupaba que fuéramos demasiado diferentes, pero... me ha ayudado a ver que puedo ser sincera con usted».
languages.original_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."

traits.locale_text: «Admito que me preocupaba que fuéramos demasiado diferentes, pero... me ha ayudado a ver que puedo ser sincera con usted».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしたちは違いすぎるのではないかと不安でした。それでも…{name}様のおかげで、あたくしは率直に胸の内を打ち明けることができることに気付いたのです」
languages.original_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしたちは違いすぎるのではないかと不安でした。それでも…{name}様のおかげで、あたくしは率直に胸の内を打ち明けることができることに気付いたのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich gebe zu, ich hatte befürchtet, wir wären zu verschieden. Und dennoch ... habt Ihr mir geholfen, zu erkenne, dass ich offen mit Euch sein kann."
languages.original_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe zu, ich hatte befürchtet, wir wären zu verschieden. Und dennoch ... habt Ihr mir geholfen, zu erkenne, dass ich offen mit Euch sein kann."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je craignais que nous ne soyons bien {mf|différents|différentes}, et pourtant... Je réalise à présent que je peux être parfaitement honnête avec vous. »
languages.original_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."

traits.locale_text: « Je craignais que nous ne soyons bien {mf|différents|différentes}, et pourtant... Je réalise à présent que je peux être parfaitement honnête avec vous. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "İtiraf ediyorum, birbirimizden çok farklı olmamızdan korkmuştum. Ancak seninle içten konuşabileceğimi fark etmemi sağladın."
languages.original_text: "I admit I was afraid we were too different. And yet... You helped me realise that I can be candid with you."

traits.locale_text: "Birbirimizden çok farklı olmamızdan korktuğumu itiraf ediyorum ama yine de seninle içten konuşabileceğimi fark etmemi sağladın."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
